resources.string:
Simple app, which transforms text to speech using speech synthesis by Google.
 If you have no speech synthesis, this app will make a notification about it. You can download speech synthesis in Google Play.
Currently this app supports only Russian language.
"Salty" - it's the language from childhood, it consists of using russian sound "s" after every vowel with this vowel. This mode applicable for Russian keyboard only.
This app has no any meaning. It was made for educational purposes and for fun.\n © Denis Korobkov, 2015
Съешь ещё 23% этих мягких французских булок, да выпей же 18645 чашек чаю
TTS Initialization Failed :(\nPlease install speech synthesis by Google and turn it on.
